answer:
The BC routine immunization schedules are found here and grade six would be the next school based vaccine program offered. Tips for locating immunization records are here.

question: My child is 10,5 years old and I would like to know if she is due for immunization. Where can I find this information and how can I obtain her immunization schedule.
question_variation_1: when is child due for immunizations
question_variation_2: when will my child be immunized
